sourcesContent: import NumberInput from '@components/number-input' import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText, Label } from 'reactstrap' const NumberInputWrap = () => { return ( Number Wrapping To allow the Number Input to wrap from max to min when incrementing (or min to max when decrementing), set the wrap prop to true. ) } export default NumberInputWrap
